short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insert frequently used text prompts to ChatGPT in seconds with custom shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to copy-paste and boost your productivity with the ChatGPT Prompt Shortcut Chrome Extension! 

👉🏻 This handy tool allows you to insert frequently used text snippets to ChatGPT with simple shortcuts. 
✅ Just type `/q` or a custom shortcut, like `/t` and watch it auto-fill in ChatGPT.
🚀 Customize your shortcuts to fit your needs, making entering repetitive prompts faster and easier than ever.
👨🏻‍💻 Perfect for busy professionals, students, and anyone looking to save time typing ChatGPT prompts.
🔒 We don’t store any of your data including the prompts; all data is securely stored on your local machine.

✨ Try ChatGPT Prompt Shortcut today and experience 10x productivity!
